summary:
This adds a standalone, marriagable, Breton follower.  You have to rescue her from bandits in the Embershard Mine. 
Disclaimer: Calypso is not intended to be a masturbation fantasy or a supermodel.  
Complaining about how ugly she is will just lead to me copy/pasting this disclaimer.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Calypso


------------------------------------------------------
Author: MojoDaJojo

------------------------------------------------------

0: Name / Author
1: Thanks / Credits
2: Requirements
3: Description
4: Installation / Uninstallation
5: Version History / Bug Fixes
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues
7: Legal

------------------------------------------------------
1: Thanks/Credits

Bethesda         - For making games that someone as challenged as me can mod.

The Nexus        - For a hassle free place to upload mods.

Apachii, Helga   - For her hair meshes, textures


------------------------------------------------------
2: Requirements

A legal copy of Skyrim.

The latest official patch.


------------------------------------------------------
3: Description


Disclaimer: Calypso is not intended to be a masturbation fantasy or a supermodel.  

Complaining about how ugly she is will just lead to me copy/pasting this disclaimer.


Caveat: The bandit that guards her cell has a fairly high damage output.  If you are playing a low level 
character on a higher difficulty setting, he may be challenging.

----

Short:

This adds a standalone, marriagable, Breton follower.  You have to rescue her from bandits in the Embershard Mine. 

----

Long:

This adds a standalone, marriagable, Breton follower.  You have to rescue her from bandits in the Embershard Mine.  
Embershard is the mine right near Riverwood that\'s likely the first cave you see after the tutorial. 
She uses the same voice as Lydia, and is definitely not a supermodel (nor is she intended to be.)

After you talk to her the first time, her home is set to the Sleeping Giant\'s Inn. This is so 
she doesn\'t hang out in Embershard if you don\'t want to use her as a follower yet.  
You can change her home package\'s location at any time to whatever your current location is through dialogue.

  
There is an amulet you can use to summon her to your location.  If the amulet is not present in either your or her inventory, 
it will spawn in Calypso\'s inventory.  The amulet takes up no editor slots, so it won\'t unequip anything when used.

Calypso prefers magic and archery.  She probably won\'t use melee much unless she\'s completely 
out of magicka and/or has close range aggro.

She has the following Perks:

LightFoot           - Does not trigger pressure plates.
Stealth80           - 40% harder to detect when sneaking.
Ranger              - Able to move faster with a drawn bow.
RangeOfMovement     - Reduced movement penalty in light armor.
Recovery30          - Magicka regenerates 25% faster.
QuickShot           - Can draw a bow 30% faster.
MuffledMovement     - Noise from armor is reduced 50%.
Overdraw20          - Bows do 40% more damage.

She has a flames type spell that will level up at level 10, 20, 30, 40 and 50. 

She has a custom gift list consisting of a poison, a restoration potion and a high damage arrow.   



It\'s not required, but I highly recommend UFO Ultimate Follower Overhaul:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?


------------------------------------------------------
4: Installation / Uninstallation

Install:

Dump the files from the mod into the one in your Skyrim/Data folder.


Uninstall:

Remove the files that came with the mod.
An easy way to do this would be to copy, (not cut),
the files into the folder a second time, and overwrite everything.
Now hit undo.
Assuming you\'re using windows this will delete the necessary files.


------------------------------------------------------
5: Version History / Bug Fixes

.8



------------------------------------------------------
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues




------------------------------------------------------
7: Legal



Her hair meshes and textures are not mine, so you\'d need to talk to Apachii in regards to those.  

The rest of this file I don\'t personally care what you do with.
author: MojoDaJojo
